logs.logContent: The USS Enterprise arrived at Vulcan for a high-level diplomatic summit. Captain Jean-Luc Picard met with Vulcan officials to discuss Federation policy.
A plasma leak in engineering was quickly contained. Captain Jean-Luc Picard praised the engineering team.
An alien infiltrator was exposed by security. Captain Jean-Luc Picard led the debriefing.
The USS Enterprise's computer core was upgraded. Captain Jean-Luc Picard oversaw the process to ensure security.
A temporal rift appeared off the port bow. The USS Enterprise science team is investigating. Captain Jean-Luc Picard has ordered yellow alert.
An alien signal was decoded by communications. Captain Jean-Luc Picard ordered a response sent.
A crew exchange program with another Federation ship began. Captain Jean-Luc Picard welcomed new officers.
